00073 static inline tristate sym_get_tristate_value(struct symbol *sym)
00074 {
00075         return sym->curr.tri;
00076 }
00077 
00078 
00079 static inline struct symbol *sym_get_choice_value(struct symbol *sym)
00080 {
00081         return (struct symbol *)sym->curr.val;
00082 }
00083 
00084 static inline bool sym_set_choice_value(struct symbol *ch, struct symbol *chval)
00085 {
00086         return sym_set_tristate_value(chval, yes);
00087 }
00088 
00089 static inline bool sym_is_choice(struct symbol *sym)
00090 {
00091         return sym->flags & SYMBOL_CHOICE ? true : false;
00092 }
00093 
00094 static inline bool sym_is_choice_value(struct symbol *sym)
00095 {
00096         return sym->flags & SYMBOL_CHOICEVAL ? true : false;
00097 }
00098 
00099 static inline bool sym_is_optional(struct symbol *sym)
00100 {
00101         return sym->flags & SYMBOL_OPTIONAL ? true : false;
00102 }
00103 
00104 static inline bool sym_has_value(struct symbol *sym)
00105 {
00106         return sym->flags & SYMBOL_NEW ? false : true;
00107 }
